mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Miley, Michael, 1841-1918
mdRecord.dcterms:description: These pictures are portraits of Tom Bledsoe and two teammates wearing football uniforms. In Pose 1, they are holding a starting position. In Pose 2, they are standing. These prints were made from the original glass plate negatives, which are housed at Virginia Historical Society.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Portraits of Tom Bledsoe and Two Others (photographs)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Portrait photography
Virginia -- Rockbridge County
Twentieth century
Washington and Lee University
Students
